features: It provides a smooth, close, comfortable shave
Free of alcohol, dyes, lanolin, proteins, fragrances and formaldehyde
Non-lathering formula specially developed for those who have easily irritated, sensitive skin
body.description: Vanicream Shave Cream is non-lathering formula has been specially developed for those who need, or want, to avoid common chemical irritants found in ordinary shave creams. Ideal for those who have easily irritated, sensitive skin. It provides a smooth, close, comfortable shave by creating a protective barrier between the razor and your skin.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Shave Cream Provides a smooth, close, comfortable shave for both men and women by creating a protective barrier between the razor and skin. Helps protect against razor burn, nicks, and cuts. Rinses clean, leaving skin feeling soft, smooth, and moisturized. A non-lathering formula specially developed for those who have easily irritated, sensitive skin. No botanical extracts or essential oils. Alcohol-free. Gluten-free. Ingredients - purified water, stearic acid, glycerin, caprylic/capric triglyceride, hydrogenated polydecene, panthenol, PEG-12 dimethicone, 1,2-hexanediol, titanium dioxide, sodium polyacrylate, caprylyl glycol, sodium hydroxide, isopropyl titanium triisostearate, disodium EDTA Directions - Wet skin with warm water. Apply a thin layer on area to be shaved. Shave, rinsing razor head frequently to prevent clogging. Rinse skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This product is so far the only one I’ve found that does not irritate my skin when shaving with it. I would highly recommend

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It works really good on sensitive skin, no irritation at all.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great price great shave
reviews.reviewText: At first I didn't think I was going to like this product due to the fact that it wasn't working up a thick lather so that I can create Chris sharp facial hair lines. When I used it I was impressed by how my Razor was gliding across my cheeks and neck especially my neck area because that usually feels like I am ripping up wings with a backhoe in reverse no matter what razor I'm using or gel on shaving with but this stuff was as if I had butter or oil across my skin without the texture. And also didn't get greasy or sticky and when I was finished I did not need to apply aftershave moisturizing cream like I've had to do ever since I was in niddle school. I've been shaving since the 6th grade and have been getting ripped off on expensive products the entire time I'm now 40 this product feels like I came up on the company that made it because it was very cheap and gets the job done better than I could have ever expected.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Doctor said I should use because of fragrance allergies
reviews.reviewText: It is almost odor free. I found it was not as good for shaving.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Smooth non irritating shave. As good as rival brand that cost almost three time the price. Used to be annoyed by corn chip aroma but I think they improved formula. I don’t smell it anymore.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Does the job but don't like the smell
reviews.reviewText: Haven't had any skin reaction to it, and the bottle lasts a while, but the smell is unpleasant.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: A good product! Be careful with women’s razors as it can be foamy on legs, but 10/10 use every shave. Would buy again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Does absolutely nothing
reviews.reviewText: Almost makes it more difficult for my razor to glide across my skin. Doesn’t provide a smooth close shave at all either and has a weird smell. Waste of money and it’s not returnable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on September 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I’m not sure why everyone mentions the bad smell of this product, because I think it is quite neutral. I was trepidatious buying it because of the reviews, although I’m glad I did. I can’t use any products with dye or scents and this is a real godsend.
This product is excellent. I have allergies to cosmetics and frangrances and this product has not given me any rashes or skin irritation.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on April 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: Smells weird and still cut myself
reviews.reviewText: First of all, this product stinks. It has a popcorn type smell or some sort of corn. I needed to apply a fair amount as it doesn't go on very thickly. I still ended up still slicing myself with the razor even though this stuff claims to prevent cuts and puts a "protective barrier" which it clearly doesn't. The only positive is my skin is very soft from the shave and I didn't react to it. That's about it. I wouldn't recommend as I still cut myself despite the advertising suggesting it wouldn't do that.
My husband and I both use this. It leaves our skin soft and smooth. No harsh fragrance.
